channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW and Two Other Questions

item.title: By: Brandon Tilley
item.dc:creator: Brandon Tilley
item.content:encoded:
I can accept if they want to break boss announcement mods for some reason which only their leetness can understand, and I can accept that raiders have to watch the boss targeting to see who’s going to be the lucky one to take an orb to the face, but they (the royal Developers They) can’t have it both ways.

Um, did you read that wrong? Let’s look again:

There is a bug in that there is currently no combat log message for him casting Arcane Orb (just the impact message), causing boss mods to not work. This will be fixed in a future patch.

They didn’t mean to break the bossmods, and they’re gonna fix that.

item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description:
Warcraftrealms is where I've been checking a lot of our recent applicants. We had one that basically hopped guilds every week for a year, then applied to us. Most of the guilds being those "Join us in random_spelled_pop_culture_reference! Send tell for invite!", but now that he was 70, he wanted some raidin' action.
Pass.
item.content:encoded:
Warcraftrealms is where I’ve been checking a lot of our recent applicants. We had one that basically hopped guilds every week for a year, then applied to us. Most of the guilds being those “Join us in random_spelled_pop_culture_reference! Send tell for invite!”, but now that he was 70, he wanted some raidin’ action.

Pass.

item.title: By: celerie
item.dc:creator: celerie
item.description:
1. we walked into VR to gear up some alts and... whoa. definitely a surprise. =/
2. yes, 10 guilds is a lot. i hate it when stupid attention hoes give the rest of the female gaming population a bad name. =(
3. log into stumbleupon ffs. =)
item.content:encoded:
1. we walked into VR to gear up some alts and… whoa. definitely a surprise. =/

2. yes, 10 guilds is a lot. i hate it when stupid attention hoes give the rest of the female gaming population a bad name. =(

3. log into stumbleupon ffs. =)

item.title: By: Indy
item.dc:creator: Indy
item.description:
Ten guilds in a year is a lot.
Did the paladin come back to your guild? (Or try to?)
item.content:encoded:
Ten guilds in a year is a lot.

Did the paladin come back to your guild? (Or try to?)

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Northshire Abbey, doing their Welcome to WoW quests. We like to get them early, before they're jaded and bitter.
item.content:encoded: Northshire Abbey, doing their Welcome to WoW quests. We like to get them early, before they’re jaded and bitter.

item.title: By: Exeter
item.dc:creator: Exeter
item.description: I just have to ask: where do you FIND these people?
item.content:encoded: I just have to ask: where do you FIND these people?

item.title: By: wowpanda
item.dc:creator: wowpanda
item.description:
I don't know the first question.
The second one is most likely because a developer oversight (or some internal tweak gone wrong) and left a bug. And there is no way to push a patch that quickly in such a big company, so it is postponed.
The third one, I feel for you man. It will be really great if you can get some of the pics, like last one :-)
item.content:encoded:
I don’t know the first question.

The second one is most likely because a developer oversight (or some internal tweak gone wrong) and left a bug. And there is no way to push a patch that quickly in such a big company, so it is postponed.

The third one, I feel for you man. It will be really great if you can get some of the pics, like last one ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Fitz
item.dc:creator: Fitz
item.description: The hatchery by the Teldrassil docks! (Do I get extra marks for being a hordie?)
item.content:encoded: The hatchery by the Teldrassil docks! (Do I get extra marks for being a hordie?)
